hero.title: NextHome Labs
hero.subtitle: Abakulembera mu Kuyiiya mu Tekinologiya y'Afrika
hero.description: Kyusa bizinensi yo n'enzijanjalo zaffe eza AI, blockchain, ne sisitemu z'amakolero. Tukulembera mu ntambula y'ebyatekinologiya okwetooloola Afrika, nga tuwa obuzimba obuyiiya obukuza entambula n'obukozi.

problemSolvers.title: Abalondawo Ebizibu
problemSolvers.description: Tutegeera era tulondawo ebizibu byo ebikulu eby'etekinologiya

secure.title: Bikuumiddwa & Bitegeekekeka
secure.description: Okukuuma n'obwesigwa ku mutindo gw'amakolero kiri kikakase

fast.title: Okuteekawo Amangu
fast.description: Okuteekawo amangu okukendeeza okutawanya mu bizinensi

ai.title: Amagezi Amagonge
ai.description: Enziyanjalo z'AI ensaasaanya ezikozesa omulembe oguddako ogw'aplikeesheni

blockchain.title: Tekinologiya ya Blockchain
blockchain.description: Sisitemu zikuumiddwa, ntangaavu, era za desentralize olw'omulembe ogujja

global.title: Akabi k'Ensi Yonna
global.description: Okuyiiyayiiya enziyanjalo ezisukka ku nsalo era okukyusa obulamu

trust.title: Batukkiriza Ebitongole Ebikulembera
trust.description: Weegatte ku bizinensi ebisukka mu bikumi ebikkiriza NextHomeLabs olw'enziyanjalo ez'etekinologiya ezikuumiddwa era ez'obuyiiya

cta.text: Oli mweteefuteefu okukyusa bizinensi yo n'enziyanjalo z'etekinologiya ezikuumiddwa era ez'obuyiiya?
